revision.text: ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|3o|di-inceptive|3s|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-leeh}} {{nv-link-to-root|-LOʼ|act with a rope}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she starts to [[drive]] it along (a vehicle, originally by means of reins or cables) # he/she starts to [[carry]] it along by a handle, string, or cord (as a suitcase) ====Conjugation==== {{nv-conj-auto|di|yi|∅|leeh|loʼ|loh}} ====Verbal stems==== * ITERATIVE: -d + -loh = -dloh * OPTATIVE: -leeh ====Related terms==== * {{l|nv|yíleeh}} * {{l|nv|yooloh}}
